actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources requested executive comment from Education Department, OMB.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Education, Arts, and Humanities

official_title: A bill to amend part B of title IV of the Higher Education Act of 1965, relating to the guaranteed student loan program, to permit the deferment of payment of principal for 1 year for students who are on maternity leave if the students are enrolled in institutions of higher education.

summary.text: Student Aid Assistance Amendments of 1985 - Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to permit, under the guaranteed student loan program, the deferment of principal payments for up to 12 months while an enrolled student borrower is on maternity leave.

titles.title: A bill to amend part B of title IV of the Higher Education Act of 1965, relating to the guaranteed student loan program, to permit the deferment of payment of principal for 1 year for students who are on maternity leave if the students are enrolled in institutions of higher education.
